item.description: Notes This queue-base is particularly finicky with piece order. item.title: IOSZ QB
item.description: Notes Practice Queue: [IOSZ]p4,*p7 Keep in mind you can use mirrors of the setups for specific queues. Setups I > LJ (save T) !

item.title: Perfect Clear Opener
item.description: Shortened as PCO. An opener for getting a perfect clear. The build rate is 100% if an [[#alternative build]] is considered.

item.title: Perfect Clears
item.description: Here are setups for various perfect clears. More to come later Categories 1st [[perfect-clears/2nd/2nd_index|2nd PC]] 3rd 4th 5th 6th [[perfect-clears/7th/7th|7th PC]] 8th 9th
